text: Which of the following options are correct? Statement 1: Intellectual property is different from real property. Statement 2: Intellectual property may include critical business information.

options: A code for developing MS Office
A. R Rahman’s new composition of a Bollywood song

text: Which of the following options are correct? Statement 1: Infringement means assignment of an intellectual property right. Statement 2: Intellectual property is different from intellectual property right

Intellectual Property is mostly a type of—
What is the duration of copyright protection Paul can seek in India for his new non-fiction book?
options: Only during the lifetime of Paul
Lifetime of Paul plus a period of 60 years after his death
Paul or his legal heirs can seek copyright protection in his work for perpetuity
answers: Lifetime of Paul plus a period of 60 years after his death

options: Trip Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Routes
Trade Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights
Trade Related Aspects of Internal Property Rights
Trip Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Roles
Trade Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Routes
answers: Trade Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights
